title: Waistcoat, 1770–80
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique:  satin, stem and knot embroidery stitches in 10 shades of silk on twill foundation
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Edward C. Post
description: Embroidered wasitcoat with floral design continuous at the front and lower edges and pocket area, with small offset sprigs spaced over the ground. Small standing collar.
